are you using openglad or the original dos version of glad?  I don't know if
they installed that 'feature' on openglad, where if you left+right click at
the same time rapidy, it purchases your edited stats, regardless of whether
or not you can afford it.  If you want a copy of the original dos based
glad, contact me, it even comes with the 'cheats.txt' with all the regular
cheats you know, plus the cheats in the character editing location.

-----Original Message-----
From: truevirus2002 [mailto:truevirus28@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 10, 2003 4:20 PM
To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [gladiator] freebuystats


shigeki i dont understand what u mean by free buy stats every time i
click fast on buy button in will only go by the money i have so uve
got to explain it better plz
